name: agencies_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bayut.
Tool description: This API helps to query real estate in UAE to create a real estate site/application
API description: Fetches a list of agencies or searches for agencies by name using the specified parameters.

page.description: The page number for paging purposes. Defaults to 0.

lang.description: Language for the response, either 'en' for English or 'ar' for Arabic. Defaults to 'en'.

hitsperpage.description: Number of hits per page for paging purposes. Defaults to 25.

query.description: Search term or phrase for filtering the agencies by name. Defaults to 'patriot'.
